pages.text: Flare's are a Comatose's equivalent of a Blaze. However, unlike a Blaze they only attack meele. If a Flare is spinning 'fast' this usually means that it is trying to attack something/someone. On hit they ingite their target$(br2)On death they flashbang their target and drop blaze rods and powder
Flare's are found in a Comatose within the Surreal biome
